epic.title: Intelligent Scheduling & Patient Access
epic.summary: Heuristic scheduling engine with omnichannel patient engagement (WhatsApp, web portal, mobile app) designed to maximize provider utilization and reduce no-shows.
epic.businessOverview: Heuristic scheduling engine with omnichannel patient engagement (WhatsApp, web portal, mobile app) designed to maximize provider utilization and reduce no-shows.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Heuristic scheduling algorithm engine
- WhatsApp Business API integration
- Twilio/SMS gateway service
- Real-time sync engine (WebSocket/SSE)
- Calendar integration service (Google/Microsoft)
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Day 1:**
- Provider schedule configuration

**Day 2:**
- Patient contact list import

**Day 3:**
- Portal and WhatsApp activation

**Week 2:**
- Reminder cadence optimization
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Dermatology Center, Austin**

- **Outcome:** Reduced no-show rate from 18% to 4% in 60 days, added 12 billable hours/week

stories.title: Multi-provider calendar view (day/week/month)
stories.description: Implement a multi-provider calendar view that supports day, week, and month views with real-time availability updates.

stories.title: Appointment type configuration (consultation, follow-up, procedure)
stories.description: Allow configuration of different appointment types (consultation, follow-up, procedure) with customizable durations and requirements.

stories.title: Real-time availability updates < 1 second
stories.description: Ensure real-time availability updates are delivered within 1 second to provide accurate booking information to patients.

stories.title: Support 100 concurrent booking requests
stories.description: System must support handling 100 concurrent booking requests without degradation in performance or availability.
